title: How to Get and Spread Pokerus

steps.headline: Get Pokérus.
steps.description:
There are three ways to do this:
Battle a Pokémon with Pokérus
Catch a Pokémon with Pokérus
Get infected from a friend

steps.headline: Have the Pokérus infected Pokémon first in your party, and the Pokémon you want to have Pokerus in your second slot.
Do about 5 battles.
steps.description: Some of the first routes you encounter are good battling spots.

steps.headline: Check the status screen of the Pokémon you are trying to infect.
steps.description: If it is infected, the purple PKRS sign should be there.

text:
Get Pokérus. There are three ways to do this:
Battle a Pokémon with Pokérus
Catch a Pokémon with Pokérus
Get infected from a friend Have the Pokérus infected Pokémon first in your party, and the Pokémon you want to have Pokerus in your second slot.  Do about 5 battles. Some of the first routes you encounter are good battling spots. Check the status screen of the Pokémon you are trying to infect. If it is infected, the purple PKRS sign should be there.
